content:
I apologize if my previous response did not meet your expectations. Here's another attempt at an ASCII art heart:
```
  /\
 /  \
/    \
```
/  
/ /\  
/ / \  
/\_\_/\_\_\_*\_*\

This is a more traditional representation of a heart shape using simple geometric shapes. However, there are many different styles and variations of ASCII art, so there are many other ways to create an ASCII heart.
